note:
Just a SysAdmin/SRE/Dev(Sec)Ops/ISSO guy, tech lover, sometimes photographer, rescue dog parent, sous vide & grilling fan. I like whisky & bourbon & rye. Expect relevant pics, especially pets & food.

Assume that I know nothing, and will inadvertently offend. I'm trying, learning, deprogramming. If I offend, call me out, since I probably need it.

If you need me, I'm there for you. No qualifiers. You need, I'm there. Period. End of story.

I want to be the change I want to see in the world.

fields.name: Pronouns
fields.value: He/Him, They/Them, whatever is easier for you. I'm easy that way.

fields.name: Politics
fields.value: Everyone deserves to exist, and I will fight tooth and nail for that. I'm a safe space.
